Questions.Label: Upload your organisation's commitment statement template
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
Your organisation can use ESFA's commitment statement, use one from a third party or create its own.

It must include:

  • the planned content and schedule for training
  • what is expected and offered by the employer, the training organisation and the apprentice
  • a section for the employer, apprentice and training organisation to sign
  • how this will be communicated to users throughout their journey

Find out more about commitment statements in the apprenticeship funding rules (opens in a new window).

The file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.
